item.title: Contact Form
item.dc:creator: durre
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name /100 class:form-control]
[email* your-email /100 class:form-control]
[text your-subject /100 class:form-control]
[textarea* your-message x10/5000 class:form-control]
[submit class:btn class:btn-primary class:btn-lg "Send Message"]
[your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto (http://spyropress.com/porto) no-reply@spyropress.com [your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto (http://spyropress.com/porto) [your-email] Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill the required field. Your entered code is incorrect. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid. Your answer is not correct. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred.

item.title: Contact Advanced
item.dc:creator: durre
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name /100 class:form-control]
[email* your-email /100 class:form-control]
[select* your-subject class:form-control "Option 1" "Option 2" "Option 3" "Option 4"]
[checkbox checkboxs use_label_element "1" "2" "3" "4" "5"]
[radio radios use_label_element "1" "2" "3" "4" "5"]
[file attachment]
[textarea* your-message x10/5000 class:form-control]
[captchac captcha bg:#F2F2F2 size:l]
[captchar captcha class:form-control]
[submit class:btn class:btn-primary class:btn-lg class:pull-right "Send Message"]
